content.task: Define comprehensive test strategy for compliance violation remediation. We have 15+ pytest.skip violations across test_stellar_exchange_contract.py, test_stellar_components_adapted.py, test_stellar_testnet.py, and test_performance_benchmarks.py. Need systematic approach to fix failing tests instead of bypassing them per DEVELOPMENT_RULES.md.
content.context: Context: COMPLIANCE_VIOLATIONS_REPORT.md shows systematic test bypassing with pytest.skip. Examples: "Test requires StellarExchange API integration", "Health check API needs adaptation", "Testnet tests require live network connectivity". Need proper test infrastructure instead of skipping.
